theGamblignant:Gank.NAME: Gank
theGamblignant:Gank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and add !M! to your next roll.

theGamblignant:JumpKick.NAME: Jump Kick
theGamblignant:JumpKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If target enemy has any Block, take 5 damage.

theGamblignant:Scintillate.NAME: Scintillate
theGamblignant:Scintillate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Luck. At the end of your turn, lose !M! Luck.

theGamblignant:ShiningArmor.NAME: Shining Armor
theGamblignant:ShiningArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and add !M! to your next roll.

theGamblignant:StrokeOfLuck.NAME: Stroke Of Luck
theGamblignant:StrokeOfLuck.DESCRIPTION: Add 8 to your next roll. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:StrokeOfLuck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Add 8 to your next roll. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:SlideKick.NAME: Slide Kick
theGamblignant:SlideKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies.

theGamblignant:CunningAction.NAME: Cunning Action
theGamblignant:CunningAction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Block equal to blocked damage dealt.

theGamblignant:DazzlingGleam.NAME: Dazzling Gleam
theGamblignant:DazzlingGleam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and add !M! to your next roll.

theGamblignant:Charisma.NAME: Charisma
theGamblignant:Charisma.DESCRIPTION: Increase dice rolls made on Attacks by 1.
theGamblignant:Charisma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase dice rolls made on Attacks by 2.

theGamblignant:Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
theGamblignant:Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: Increase dice rolls made on Skills by 1.

theGamblignant:Gatekeep.NAME: Gatekeep
theGamblignant:Gatekeep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you fully Block an attack, the attacker loses 1 Strength.

theGamblignant:QuiverDance.NAME: Quiver Dance
theGamblignant:QuiverDance.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! to the first roll you make each turn.

theGamblignant:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
theGamblignant:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain 1 Luck. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:UTurn.NAME: U-Turn
theGamblignant:UTurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If 1d4 = 4, gain 1 Energy and draw a card.

theGamblignant:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
theGamblignant:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Subtract 3 from your next roll.

theGamblignant:Pilfer.NAME: Pilfer
theGamblignant:Pilfer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Gold equal to unblocked damage dealt.
theGamblignant:Pilfer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 1d8 + !D! damage. Gain Gold equal to unblocked damage dealt.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: damage. Gain Gold equal to unblocked damage dealt.

theGamblignant:PoisonSting.NAME: Poison Sting
theGamblignant:PoisonSting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1d8 Poison. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:FuryCutter.NAME: Fury Cutter
theGamblignant:FuryCutter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Double this card's damage for this combat.

theGamblignant:DeviousLick.NAME: Devious Lick
theGamblignant:DeviousLick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and add !M! to your next roll.

theGamblignant:PowerTrip.NAME: Gaslight
theGamblignant:PowerTrip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals 1 additional damage for each stack of the target's buffs and debuffs.

theGamblignant:Gaslight.NAME: Meteor Shower
theGamblignant:Gaslight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 6d8 damage to all enemies and lose 1 Luck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: damage to all enemies and lose 1 Luck.

theGamblignant:LusterPurge.NAME: Luster Purge
theGamblignant:LusterPurge.DESCRIPTION: Deal 4d6 damage to all enemies, then gain 1 Luck for each enemy affected. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:LusterPurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 6d6 damage to all enemies, then gain 1 Luck for each enemy affected. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: damage to all enemies, then gain 1 Luck for each enemy affected. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:JujuBreaker.NAME: Juju Breaker
theGamblignant:JujuBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage. Remove all buffs from both you and target enemy. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:JujuBreaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage. Remove all buffs from target enemy. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:SolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
theGamblignant:SolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Heal Xd3 HP. At the start of next turn, deal Xd20 damage to all enemies. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:SolarBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal Xd4 HP. At the start of next turn, deal Xd24 damage to all enemies. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:Meddle.NAME: Meddle
theGamblignant:Meddle.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1d8 Block and add !M! to your next roll.
theGamblignant:Meddle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1d10 Block and add !M! to your next roll.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Block and add !M! to your next roll.

theGamblignant:Fuss.NAME: Fuss
theGamblignant:Fuss.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Subtract 3 from your next roll.
theGamblignant:Fuss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. Subtract 3 from your next roll.

theGamblignant:MoodSwing.NAME: Mood Swing
theGamblignant:MoodSwing.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1d4 Strength. At the end of this turn, lose 1d4 Strength. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:MoodSwing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1d6 Strength. At the end of this turn, lose 1d6 Strength. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:Call.NAME: Call
theGamblignant:Call.DESCRIPTION: If target enemy intends to Attack, gain 1 Luck. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: That guy doesn't intend to attack!

theGamblignant:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
theGamblignant:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw 1d6 cards. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:Mulligan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw 1d6 cards.

theGamblignant:DiceTechnique.NAME: Dice Technique
theGamblignant:DiceTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack of any color to your hand, with 1d8 determining its rarity.
theGamblignant:DiceTechnique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack of any color to your hand, with 1d8 determining its rarity. It costs 0 this turn.

theGamblignant:SavingRoll.NAME: Saving Roll
theGamblignant:SavingRoll.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Skill of any color to your hand, with 1d8 determining its rarity.
theGamblignant:SavingRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Skill of any color to your hand, with 1d8 determining its rarity. It costs 0 this turn.

theGamblignant:Fold.NAME: Fold
theGamblignant:Fold.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

theGamblignant:BlindingFlash.NAME: Blinding Flash
theGamblignant:BlindingFlash.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Luck. Apply 2 Weak to all enemies. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:MindFang.NAME: Mind Fang
theGamblignant:MindFang.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1d8 Poison and 1d4 Weak to target enemy. Lose 1 Luck.
theGamblignant:MindFang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1d10 Poison and 1d5 Weak to target enemy. Lose 1 Luck.

theGamblignant:BigBlind.NAME: Big Blind
theGamblignant:BigBlind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Luck. All enemies gain !M! Strength.

theGamblignant:Clairvoyant.NAME: Clairvoyant
theGamblignant:Clairvoyant.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !M! temporary Luck. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:Pupation.NAME: Pupation
theGamblignant:Pupation.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Powers into your draw pile. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:MindControl.NAME: Mind Control
theGamblignant:MindControl.DESCRIPTION: If target enemy intends to attack, it attacks itself or a random enemy and is stunned for 1 turn. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:MindControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. If target enemy intends to attack, it attacks itself or a random enemy and is stunned for 1 turn. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:DoomsdayDevice.NAME: Doomsday Device
theGamblignant:DoomsdayDevice.DESCRIPTION: After 8 turns, deal 88 damage to all enemies. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:DoomsdayDevice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. After 8 turns, deal 88 damage to all enemies. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:Superstition.NAME: Superstition
theGamblignant:Superstition.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you roll a 1, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theGamblignant:LoadedDice.NAME: Loaded Dice
theGamblignant:LoadedDice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you roll a die, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

theGamblignant:FengShui.NAME: Feng Shui
theGamblignant:FengShui.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1d8 Block.
theGamblignant:FengShui.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1d8 Block. At the start of your turn, gain 1d8 Block.

theGamblignant:AncestralAwakening.NAME: Ancestral Awakening
theGamblignant:AncestralAwakening.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a D8 is rolled, it results in an 8.

theGamblignant:TricksterMode.NAME: Trickster Mode
theGamblignant:TricksterMode.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1d6 Luck. At the end of your turn, lose 1d6 Luck. Ignores your Luck.
theGamblignant:TricksterMode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1d8 Luck. At the end of your turn, lose 1d8 Luck. Ignores your Luck.

theGamblignant:ThiefForm.NAME: Thief Form
theGamblignant:ThiefForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 Luck. Whenever you are attacked, lose 1 Luck.
theGamblignant:ThiefForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 Luck. Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, lose 1 Luck.
